Deck of cards

Source: R/data-cards.R
cards.Rd

All the cards in a standard deck.

cards

Format

A data frame with 52 observations on the following 4 variables.

value

a factor with levels 10 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 A J K Q

color

a factor with levels black red

suit

a factor with levels Club Diamond Heart Spade

face

a logical vector

Examples


table(cards$value)
#> 
#> 10  2  3  4  5  6  7  8  9  A  J  K  Q 
#>  4  4  4  4  4  4  4  4  4  4  4  4  4 
table(cards$color)
#> 
#> black   red 
#>    26    26 
table(cards$suit)
#> 
#>    Club Diamond   Heart   Spade 
#>      13      13      13      13 
table(cards$face)
#> 
#> FALSE  TRUE 
#>    36    16 
table(cards$suit, cards$face)
#>          
#>           FALSE TRUE
#>   Club        9    4
#>   Diamond     9    4
#>   Heart       9    4
#>   Spade       9    4
